00036 #ifdef __cplusplus
00037     #define SBG_DELETE(p)       if (p){delete (p); (p) = NULL;}
00038     #define SBG_DELETE_ARRAY(p) if (p){delete[] (p); (p) = NULL;}
00039     #define SBG_FREE(p)         if (p){free(p); (p) = NULL;}
00040     #define SBG_FREE_ARRAY(p)   if (p){free(p); (p) = NULL;}
00041 #else
00042     #define SBG_DELETE(p)       if (p){free((p)); (p) = NULL;}
00043     #define SBG_DELETE_ARRAY(p) if (p){free((p)); (p) = NULL;}
00044     #define SBG_FREE(p)         if (p){free((p)); (p) = NULL;}
00045     #define SBG_FREE_ARRAY(p)   if (p){free((p)); (p) = NULL;}
00046 #endif

00051 #ifdef WIN32
00052 #ifndef __cplusplus

00054 #endif

00132 //- Versions system definitions                                        -//
00133 //----------------------------------------------------------------------//
00134 #define SBG_VERSION_MAJOR(maj)      ((maj)<<24)
00135 #define SBG_VERSION_MINOR(min)      ((min)<<16)
00136 #define SBG_VERSION_REV(rev)        ((rev)<<8)
00137 #define SBG_VERSION_BUILD(build)    (build)
00138 #define SBG_VERSION(maj,min,rev,build)  SBG_VERSION_MAJOR(maj)|SBG_VERSION_MINOR(min)|SBG_VERSION_REV(rev)|SBG_VERSION_BUILD(build)
00139 
00140 #define SBG_VERSION_GET_MAJOR(version)  (((version)>>24)&0xFF)  
00141 #define SBG_VERSION_GET_MINOR(version)  (((version)>>16)&0xFF)  
00142 #define SBG_VERSION_GET_REV(version)    (((version)>>8 )&0xFF)  
00143 #define SBG_VERSION_GET_BUILD(version)  ( (version)    &0xFF)
